Below is an instruction that describes a task, paired with an input that provides further context. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
You are a code completion assistant and your task is to analyze user edits and then rewrite an excerpt that the user provides, suggesting the appropriate edits within the excerpt, taking into account the cursor location.

### Input:
```untitled
 * engaging with people
<|editable_region_start|>
 * fixing their problems
 * demonstrating that we're working on the right things

Goals:
  - 5m start on explanation then 115m, 20 people
  - Close out duplicates, "too hard", no repro
  - reply to as many bugs as you can
    - goal: make sure people have a reply
  - close out dupes/gtfos/niche/too-hards/vague
  - move to discussions
    - editor parity requests -> "Zed Ideas from Other Editors" sections
    - worth considering -> " 

Actions for remaining Issues: 
- Set Type: [Crash, Bug, Feature, Meta]
- Edit title
- Edit description:
  - Remove header;
  - Add one sentence top: "Summary: blah!"
  - Replace screenshots/videos with text
  - Bugs: Refine/Simplify reproduction steps
- Comment with response (see templates)
- [Optional] Self assign if you want to fix
- [Optional] Add to Projects:
  - Closers Project:            https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/23
  - PaperCuts 2025:             https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/24
  - Quality Week Winter 2025:   https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/27

Response Templates:
- Bugs:
  - Thanks for reporting - that shouldn't happen. I can reproduce the problem.
  - Sorry about this! I can't easily reproduce the problem. Does this happen on all projects, or just some? Is there anything relevant in the Zed logs?
  - That doesn't sound good. Can you please clarify the step<|user_cursor_is_here|>
  - Without a reproduction steps this isn't really actionable; happy to reopen if you have steps to reproduce.
  
- Enhancements:
  - Thanks for the idea! This is likely something we should talk through in the discussions. 
  - Thanks for the idea! We're tracking all the things we could pull from [Sublime] in a discussion,
    (list of possible discussions, inlcuding editor specific ones: https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/discussions)
  - This would be great! That said, I think we should hold off until we have better extension support and build it as an extension.

## Work Segregation

- Refresh your search results pages often (avoid duplicating work)

### Issue search modifiers:

```
is:issue state:open 
comments:0
created:>2023-12-01 created:<2024-01-01 
author:@me
commenter:@me
involves:@me
interactions:>5  

### 

- [ ] 397 Bugs without comments: https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20comments%3A0%20label%3Abug
- [ ] 561 Enhancement without comments: https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20comments%3A0%20label%3Aenhancement

### Date ranges - `state:open created:>=2024-01-01 created:<2024-02-01 no:type`

- [x] [peter] [2024 Week 01](https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues?q=state%3Aopen%20created%3A%3E%3D2024-01-07%20created%3A%3C2024-01-14%20no%3Atype)
- [x] [peter] [2024 Week 02](https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues?q=state%3Aopen%20created%3A%3E%3D2024-01-14%20created%3A%3C2024-01-21%20no%3Atype)
<|editable_region_end|>
- [x] [joseph] [2024 Week 03](https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues?q=state%3Aopen%20created%3A%3E%3D2024-01-21%20created%3A%3C2024-01-28%20no%3Atype)
```

Goals:
  - 5m start on explanation then 115m, 20 people
  - Close out duplicates, "too hard", no repro
  - reply to as many bugs as you can
    - goal: make sure people have a reply
  - close out dupes/gtfos/niche/too-hards/vague
  - move to discussions
    - editor parity requests -> "Zed Ideas from Other Editors" sections
    - worth considering -> " 

Actions for remaining Issues: 
- Set Type: [Crash, Bug, Feature, Meta]
- Edit title
- Edit description:
  - Remove header;
  - Add one sentence top: "Summary: blah!"
